TopicTitle: Even without mods, ground science experiments on moon destroys frame rate

Articles.Content:
I have a very powerful system.  Intel 9700 all cores at 5 GHz, NVidia 1080, 16 Gig of fast RAM, SSD's.

Once I plop down a full complement of ground surface experiments the frame rate on the moon becomes abysmal, and the game's overall frame rate suffers tremendously, but not quite to the level of being on the moon near those surface experiments.

@Squad please look into this.  Thanks.

 

Also it doesn't always have super degraded performance upon launching the game.  It takes a bit of time, maybe instruments sending data home, before the fps disintegrates

Edited July 17, 2019 by jpinard
